To the stagnation of dragon power

Gorgoron makes his third appearance at the Golden
Palace

Who is the captain's right hand man?

column3: EX3.4限界域黒竜８人開始デモ
column4:
EX3.4 Marginal Area Black Dragon 8-person
starting demo

column3: EX3.4黒竜４人、８人共通討伐デモ
column4: EX3.4 Black Dragon 4- and 8-man common defeat demo

column3: なんだおまえは？　あ？　レオの使い？
column4: Who are you? Huh? Leo's messenger?

column3:
おい、声を低く――奴らに聞かせるな
――それで、なんの用だ
column4:
Hey, lower your voice - don't let them hear you.
So, what do you want?

column3:
あいつは昔からそうだ
自信たっぷりな態度で間違えやがる
column4:
That person has always been like that, making
mistakes with a confident attitude.
Hey, what are you whispering about?

column3: 騎士団風情に聞かせる話なんぞないわ！
column4:
I have no stories to tell that would impress the
Knightly Order!

column3:
その言葉、聞き捨てならない！
あんたも元は騎士だろう？
column4:
That word, I can't ignore it! Were you also once
a Knight?

column3:
んな昔のことは忘れたぜ！
もう５０年前だからな！
column4:
I've forgotten about such ancient things!
It's already been 50 years!

column3:
確かに俺がいた頃の騎士団は
誇り高き戦闘集団だった
column4:
Indeed, the Knight's Order back when I was there
was a proud and elite combat unit.

column3: ところが、今の騎士団はどうだ！？
column4: However, how is the current Knight's Order!?

column3: 口先だけの腰抜け集団だって言ってるんだよ！
column4:
I'm saying they're a group of cowards who only
talk big!

column3:
な？　魔物討伐の優先権があるってなら
さっさとやっつけろよ！
column4:
Huh? If there's a priority for slaying monsters,
then hurry up and defeat them already!

column3:
何度も倒している！
しかし、倒しても、また現れるのだ
column4:
I have defeated it many times!
However, no matter how many times I take it down,
it keeps reappearing.

column3:
どこかに巣窟があり、そこを叩かねば
ならないと協議しているところへ貴様が来て――
column4:
There is a nest somewhere, and we must strike it.
And just as we were discussing this, you came—

column3: ほら来た言い訳騎士団！
column4: Here comes the excuse-making Knight Order!

column3: 今度はなんだ？　奴らに聞かせるなよ
column4: What is it this time? Don't let them hear you.

column3:
なんだと！？
魔物を倒しただって？
column4:
What did you say!?
You defeated the enemy?

column3:
騎士団さんよ、人が悪いぜ
魔物はすっかり倒したらしいじゃねえか
column4:
Hey, knights! Cut the slack. It seems the
monsters are all defeated.

column3:
ったく！
おれたちは帰る！　ああ、帰るぞ！
column4:
Seriously! We're going back! Yeah, we're going
back!

column3: おまえ、騎士団副長のハインツだろ？
column4: Are you the vice captain of the Knights, Heinz?

column3:
そこまで出世するってのは
よほど話のわかる奴に違いねえ
column4:
To achieve such success, one must truly
understand the ways of the world.

column3:
だから、ここの魔物を退治したのは
あんたか部下の誰かってことにしておけ
column4:
So, let's just say that you or one of your
subordinates took care of defeating the enemies
here.

column3: それから新入り、おまえ――

いろいろ文句はあるだろうが全部飲み込め
疑問も飲み込め
column4:
There may be various complaints, but swallow them
all.
Swallow your doubts as well.

column3:
ここにいる全員、おまえの手柄は忘れない
だが、公式には騎士団が倒したことにする
column4:
Everyone here will never forget your achievement,
but officially, we'll credit the knighthood for
defeating it.

column3: はん！　その手には乗るか！
column4: Hah! Will you fall for that trap?!

column3:
恩を売りつけようというのか？
貸しを作っておこうという魂胆か！？
column4:
Are you trying to sell me your favor?
Or is your intention to create a debt!?

column3:
怒声が木々に響き渡っているが――
揉め事ではないだろうな
column4:
The angry voice echoes through the trees, but it
doesn't seem like a quarrel.

column3:
信じられないことだが、騎士と見れば
因縁をつける志の低い覚者もいるようだ
column4:
It's hard to believe, but there are some
low-minded Arisen who pick fights with Knights at
the slightest provocation.
I didn't mean to provoke anyone!

column3:
騎士団長さんよ、信じてやりな
こいつはおれたちの不作法をいさめただけだ
column4:
Oh, Captain of the Knights, please believe me.
This person merely reprimanded our rudeness.

column3:
ハインツたち、いい仕事をしたぜ？
魔物はもういない――静かなもんだ
column4:
Heinz and the others, did a great job, huh?
The enemies are gone now... It's so peaceful.

column3:
――ほう
任務はすでに完了したというのか
column4:
Oh, is it true that the mission has already been
completed?

column3:
ふむ――
レオから報告を受けて慌ててここへ来たが
column4:
Hmm...
I hurriedly came here upon receiving a report
from Leo, but...

column3:
取り越し苦労だったようだな
では、一同、神殿へ戻るがいい
column4:
It seems that we were overly worried.
Well then, everyone, let us return to the Temple.

column3: よし、じゃあ、覚者も解散だ！
column4:
Alright, then. It's time for the Arisen to
disband as well!

column3:
お疲れだったな
特におまえ――よくこらえた、いい根性だ
column4:
You must be exhausted.
Especially you - you endured well.
You have great willpower.

column3:
こんなところで――
奇遇だな
column4:
In a place like this...
What a coincidence.

column3:
我々白騎団の捜索だけでは
心許ない――
column4:
We cannot rely solely on our White Knights search
efforts—

column3: ジョゼフ殿のご判断か

ともあれ、メイリーフ嬢は
このあたりにはいない
column4: Anyway, Lady Mayleaf is not around this area.

column3:
森にいるとすれば
さらに奥――
column4: If she's in the forest, it must be further inside.

column3:
いや待て――
これはトロールの足跡！？
column4:
Wait, could it be...
These are the footprints of a Troll!?

column3:
はるか向こうまで続いているようだ
新しいぞ――？
column4:
It seems to continue far beyond. Is there
something new...?

column3: メイリーフ嬢はすでに！？
ここ、お友達のお墓なの――
column4: This is the grave of a friend...

column3:
わたしがもっと幼かった頃――
あの子も同い年で――
column4:
When I was younger...
That child was also the same age as me...

column3:
どこへ行くにも――
何をするのも一緒だった――
column4:
Wherever we go—
Whatever we do—it's together—

column3:
でも、あの子は――
大人になって――
わたしを遠ざけるようになった――
column4: She started keeping her distance from me—

column3:
わたしがいつまでたっても
少女のままだったから――
column4: Because I will forever remain a young girl—

column3:
彼女となら
ずっと仲良くできると思っていたのに――
column4:
I thought I could always get along with her,
but...

column3:
結局、あの子は
わたしを遠ざけたまま――
column4: In the end, that child keeps me at a distance...

column3:
わたしを怪物扱いしたまま
自分はしわくちゃに老いて――
column4:
Continuing to treat me like a monster, they age,
becoming wrinkled...

column3:
それ以来、人間とは
仲良くならないようにしてるんだ
column4:
Since then, I have been avoiding getting close to
humans.

column3:
いつも距離を置いて
お互い、つかず、離れず、ね
column4:
Always keeping a distance,
Neither too close nor too far, that's how we
should be, you know.

column3:
わたしが人間じゃないって
話したかな？
column4: Did I ever say that I'm not human?

column3:
人間とは
生きている時間が違うの

あなたは――
あなたやレオやイリスは特別
column4: You are... You, Leo, and Iris are special.

column3:
心臓が時を刻まないから――
年を取らないんだよね
column4:
Because the heart doesn't mark the passage of
time -
it doesn't age, you know.

column3:
わたしはゆっくりだけど
年を取る――
あなたたちは取らない――

わたしの背が伸びて
胸がふくらんだり――
column4: My height has grown, and my chest has swelled...

column3:
腰が曲がって
お婆さんになったり――
column4: My back bends and I become an old lady.

column3:
はい――これで告白はお・わ・り
じゃあ、また、神殿で！
column4:
Yes... With this, the confession is o-ver.
Well then, I'll see you again at the Temple!

column3:
はぁ――はぁ――
ジョゼフ様のご命令でね

メイリーフを見つけて
仲良くなっておけって――
column4: He told me to find Mayleaf and befriend her-

column3:
逃げた方がいいって！ 
キリがないぞ！？
column4: It's better to run away! There's no end to this!

column3: 誰かっ！　誰か助けて！

column4: That's the second time you and I have done this.

column3:
そういえば
自己紹介がまだだった

我々の出会いは
いつも慌ただしいな

メイリーフの行方には
心当たりがある
column4: I have an idea about the whereabouts of Mayleaf.

column3:
あの子の保護は
僕に任せてくれ
column4: Please entrust the protection of that child to me.

column3:
彼女の身を案じることに
かけては――
column4: When it comes to caring for her well-being...

column3: 僕の方が上だと自負している
column4: I take pride in believing that I am superior.
You should return to the Temple...

column3:
自陣の結束を
確認しておいた方がいい
column4: You should make sure your forces are united.

column3:
人の繋がりなど――
脆いものだから
column4:
Human connections and the like—
They are fragile things.

column3:
ねえ、急いで神殿へ戻ろう
嫌な予感がする
column4:
Hey, let's hurry and return to the Temple.
I have a bad feeling about this.

column3:
――いや
嫌なものを見たっていうか――
column4:
- No... It's more like I saw something
unpleasant...

column3:
狙いはエルフだぞ！　いいな？
小さいぞ！　見逃すな！
column4:
The target is an elf, got it? Small one! Don't
let them escape!

column3:
メイリーフ
俺から離れるな！
奴らは僕が引きつける
いや、敵は俺たちが引き受ける
column4: No, we'll take on the enemy.

column3:
あんたみたいな優男に
あの大軍は無理だ
column4:
A delicate man like you can't handle that massive
army.

column3: そう――ただの優男ではない
column4: I'm not just some delicate man.

column3:
さあ、愚かなオークどもよ！
エルフの命欲しくば――いざ！
column4:
Now, foolish Orcs!
If you desire the lives of the Elves,
then come forth!
Don't you want to go and help?

column3:
エルフなら
うまく逃げ切るさ
column4:
An Elf like him, should be able to escape
successfully.

column3:
ただ今より、ここを最前線とする！
戦士たちよ！　退くな！　下がるな！
column4:
From this moment on, this place shall be the
forefront!
Soldiers, do not retreat! Do not step back!

column3:
なんだ？
何が起こっている！？
ほーら、こい、こい、こっちへこい！
column4: Come on, come on, come over here!

column3:
モゴック――エルフ野郎の居場所がわかった
エルテ・ディナンだ
column4:
Mogok... I found the whereabouts of that Elf
bastard.
It's Erte Deenan.

column3: ははっ！　ズールよ、そりゃいい

ろくでなしども！　引き上げるぞ！
エルテ・ディナンへ行く
column4: Rotten scoundrels! We're going to Erte Deenan!

column3:
ああ、ハインツ、丁度良かった
わたしを神殿まで連れて帰ってくれ
column4:
Ah, Heinz, just in time.
Please take me back to the Temple.

column3:
それはもちろん！
このわたしと――
ローガンとデュークにお任せください
column4: Leave it to Logan and Duke.

column3:
世話になったな
年寄りの世話は終わりだ
column4:
I'm indebted to you.
My care for the elderly is over.
Then, let's meet at the temple.

column3: なんだか、久しぶりだね
column4: It's been a while, hasn't it?

column3:
一番最近会ったのはキノザ――
ううん、《禊の神殿》だ
column4:
The most recent one I met was in Kinoza—
No, it was in the "Temple of Purification".

column3: あの時は迷惑をかけちゃったな
column4: I caused you trouble back then.

column3:
いや、違うよね？
前回会ったのはアークの中だった
column4:
No, that's not right, is it?
The last time we met was inside the Ark.

column3:
あの時、あんたもいたよね？
レオと一緒に――
column4:
Back then, you were there too, right?
Together with Leo...

column3:
そう――来てないんだ
え？　伝言？
column4: No... they haven't come yet. Huh? A message?

column3:
「命がけで身を隠せ」――か
うん、了解
column4: "Hide yourself at all costs" — Got it.

column3: じゃあ、こっちからもレオに伝えて
column4:
Well, then, let's also convey it to Leo from our
side.

column3: 「村に迷惑をかけたくないから山に隠れる」って
column4:
"I don't want to be a nuisance to the village, so
I'll hide in the mountains," is what you're
saying, right?

column3:
さて、わたし、行くよ
――神殿のみんなによろしく
column4:
Well, I'm off.
—Please give my regards to everyone at the
Temple.

column3: 始まりは、荒波を海岸に叩きつけた強い風
column4:
It all began with a strong wind that slammed the
rough waves onto the shore.

column3: 続いて水平線に現れた黒雲は、夜のとばりの如く
column4:
The black clouds that appeared on the horizon
continued, like a veil of night,

column3: レスタニアを覆い、重い雨で大地を穿った
column4:
Covering Lestania, it pierced the earth with
heavy rain.

column3: これほどの自然の猛威は白竜の記憶にもなかった
column4:
This level of natural devastation was not even
recorded in the White Dragon's memory.

column3: 人々は怖れ、おののき、祈った
column4: The people were afraid, trembling, and prayed.

column3: その祈りを知ってか知らずか――
column4:
Whether the White Dragon knew about those prayers
or not...

column3: 白竜は、覚者たちを神殿に集めるよう
column4:
The White Dragon commanded the Arisen to gather
in the temple.

column3: では、各自、割り当てに従い現地へ向かってくれ
column4:
Now, each of you, follow your assigned location
and go there.

column3: 状況の把握が目的だが、優先すべきは人命だ
column4:
Although the purpose is to assess the situation,
saving lives should be the priority.

column3: 怯える民に白竜の加護を伝えよ！
column4:
Deliver the protection of the White Dragon to the
frightened people!

column3: が、若い女は面倒だ、おまえに任せる
column4:
Ugh, young women are such trouble.
I'll leave this to you.

column3: ――小娘ってのは、いつも俺の想像を越えやがる
column4: Ladies... They never fail to surprise me!

column3: オマイ！　またオマイか！

あの時はよくもやってくれたなあ！
ああ、覚えているとも！
column4:
You really pulled it off back then!
Ah yes, I remember it well!

column3:
踏んづけて地面にめり込ませてやりたいが
今は忙しい
column4:
I'd like to stomp you into the ground,
but I'm too busy right now.

column3: ――オレは、特別な女を探している
column4: —I am looking for a special woman.

column3:
オマイ、オレの手先になって、女を
探さないか？
column4: Will you be my henchman and help me find a woman?

column3:
――ふん、また邪魔する気だな！
つくづく、面倒な奴め！
column4:
Hmph, once again you intend to interfere!
You truly are a bothersome individual!

column3: ふん――調子に乗るがいい――
column4: Hmph, you better not get too carried away.

column3:
だがな、オマイらはオレを見るたびに
怖れおののくことになるぞ
column4:
But you all, every time you lay eyes on me, you
end up trembling in fear.

column3:
オレの主（あるじ）は
ディアマンテスだと思っておろうが――
column4:
My master is...
I know you think he's Diamantes, but...

column3: 我が主は、ああ偉大なり、黒き鎧の騎士！
column4:
My Lord, oh how magnificent you are, the Knight
in black armor!

column3:
オレは黒騎士の不死身のポーン
何度でも蘇り、オマイの前に立ちふさがってやるわ
column4:
I am the undying Pawn of the Black Knight.
I will resurrect countless times and stand before
you.

column3:
女を差し出さねば
オマイらの悪夢は永遠に終わらんぞ！
column4:
If you don't hand over the woman, your nightmares
will never end!

column3: しっかし、ズールが黒騎士のポーンだったとは！
column4: But to think Zuhl is a Pawn of the Black Knight!

column3:
セシリー、知ってた？
君がここにいた理由と関係ある？
column4:
Cecily, did you know?
Does it have anything to do with the reason you
are here?

column3: わたしが追われる理由――
column4: The reason why I am being chased—

column3:
――ずっと考えているんです
雨が目に入ってつらかったこと――
column4:
I have been thinking about it all the time.
The pain of rain getting into my eyes -

column3:
間近に迫る黒騎士がおそろしかったこと――
生き延びねばならないと決意していたこと――
column4:
The terrifying Black Knight approaching—
The determination to survive—

column3: 覚えているのはそれだけです

わたし、どこかの島に
あなたを飛ばしてしまったそうですね
column4:
I heard that I accidentally sent you to some
island, didn't I?

column3:
場所を覚えていますか？
今一度、そこへ行けないでしょうか？
column4:
Do you remember the place?
Can you go there again?

column3:
騎士団が全力で探してるよ
大丈夫、きっと見つかるって
column4:
The Knights are searching with all their might.
Don't worry, they will surely find it.

column3: 隊長、神殿へ戻りましょう
column4: Captain, let's return to the temple.

column3:
島のことが気になるし、ズールの件も報告しないと
ジョゼフ様、今頃、ぷりぷり怒ってますって
column4:
I'm curious about the island, and I need to
report about Zuhl as well.
Master Joseph must be furious by now.

column3: 心強い援軍が来てくれた
column4:
We have received reinforcements that give us
strength.

column3: 統率の右腕と呼ばれし者だ――
column4:
He is known as the right-hand man of our
commander.

column3: さあ、もうひと揉みしてやろうぞ！
column4: Well, shall I give you another massage!

column3:
わはははは！
これは気分がいい

セシリーがあんまり心配するから
連れてきちゃった
column4:
Because Cecily was so worried, I ended up
bringing her along.

column3: 見事な戦いぶりでした！

人々が覚者を頼りにする理由が
わかったような気がします
column4:
I feel like I understand why people rely on Arisen
now.

column3: 竜に選ばれ、竜を守る者
column4: Chosen by the dragon, defender of the dragon.

column3:
それだけの力を授けられているからね
もちろん、その力は、竜とレスタニアのために使うの
column4:
Because I have been bestowed with such power, I
will use it for the sake of the dragons and
Lestania, of course.
But you know, there are also worries.

column3:
ずっと先の話だけど、覚者の誰かが
白竜様を引き継ぐことになるんだよね
column4:
It's a story far in the future, but someday,
someone among the Arisen will inherit the White
Dragon.

column3: 新しい白竜として、レスタニアに君臨するの
column4:
To become the new White Dragon and reign over
Lestania.

column3:
不安っていうのはね、その時、竜になれなかった
覚者はどうなっちゃうんだろうってこと
column4:
You see, the unease comes from wondering what
happens to the Arisen who couldn't become dragons
at that time.

column3: 竜に力を返して――死んじゃうのかな？
column4:
Returning power to the dragon... will it mean
I'll die?
